item.description:
Dinner at a restaurant in Newton Corner, followed by a swing dance at the St. James Armenian Church in Watertown. There is a free beginner's lesson from 8-9pm and the dance is from 9-12pm. The featured band is Dom V and the Swingout Big Band, a 20-piece big band from Central MA who play the Watertown dance every year.

RSVP: Required by June 11.
MEET: 6:15 pm at restaurant. Restaurant location will be provided when you RSVP.
Get additional swing dance info at http://www.bostonswin....
COST: Money for dinner, $15 for the dance + $5 non-members

Trip's Leader: Sharon : swandncg1-events@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Sharon: swandncg1-events@yahoo.com to make the arrangements

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: DINNER AND SWING DANCING
